title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
The response must correctly identify the Chinese organization with the most active members.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify data based on the graph.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a pattern for members in organizations in two or more countries.

For Task C, the response must correctly describe civil society.

For Task D, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about civil society based on the data in the graph.

For Task E, the response must correctly explain what the data imply for democratization.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all five of the tasks set by the question.
